entries.name: guess(arg)
entries.desc: Guesses argument style from arg.  Returns corresponding OptionParser::Switch class (OptionalArgument, etc.).

entries.name: new(pattern = nil, conv = nil, short = nil, long = nil, arg = nil, desc = ([] if short or long), block = nil, &_block)
summarize(sdone = {}, ldone = {}, width = 1, max = width - 1, indent = "")
entries.desc: Produces the summary text. Each line of the summary is yielded to the block (without newline).
